name: 'Pray' - Papier mache brooch
description:
'Pray' is a beautiful handmade Papier Mache brooch, she could also be used as a little ornament.

She is made from recycled paper and card.

She has her name on a little slip of paper from a vintage English dictionary.

Hand made, hand painted carefully finished with a little dutch gold leaf. She has had three coats of acrylic varnish to seal her..

She is fastened with a bronze coloured brooch pin.

'Pray' is approx 7.5cm in length and 5.5cm wide.

A one of a kind item

name: 'Blackbird'
description:
'Blackbird' is a beautiful handmade Papier Mache brooch,she could also be used as a little ornament. 

She is made from recycled paper, and recycled wooden coffee sticks.

She has her name on a little slip of paper from a vintage English dictionary.

Hand made, hand painted carefully finished with a little dutch gold leaf on her 'shoes'.  She has had three coats of acrylic varnish to seal her..

She is fastened with a bronze coloured brooch pin.

'Blackbird' is approx 6cm in length and 6.5cm wide.

A one of a kind item

name: 'Their Own Home' ~ Art doll and papier mache house.
description:
'Their Own Home' is an original hand crafted art doll and papier mache house, designed and made by me, Julie.

'Their Own Home'  is one of my new range 'Our Little Castles'.   

Both pieces have unique labels which are signed. Both are free standing.  A unique collectors item.

'Their Own Home'  Art doll has been made of quilter's muslin and paperclay that has been painted and sanded, then painted and sanded again, giving the fabric a wonderfull rich patina.  

The little castle is made from vintage pages from a childrens book it has has fabric and stitched details there are loose threads, which give a sense of life to the little home.

Art doll is 10cm tall.
Papier mache home W 7.5 cm x H 12.5cm

Both have been finished with two coats of matt varnish to seal  stitching and paintwork.

NOTE *This is an art doll not intended for children.

There are more photo's on my blog...

FREE UK POSTAGE
